fields.description:
Expected result: app wouldn't crash or would throw a meaningful error

Actual result: app force-closes with Java dump that gives no indication of the nature of the problem. iOS runs without error.

~~~
"#tfield":{
   top: 100,
   borderStyle: Ti.UI.INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_ROUNDED,
   autocapitalization: false
}
~~~

To reproduce, unzip the attached file and drop it in place of a default Alloy project's app folder. Build for the Android emulator or device. App crashes on load.
fields.summary: Android: setting textfield's autocapitalization property to boolean force-closes app
